title: Crown Castle Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
text:
© Reuters. Crown Castle Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3

Investing.com - Crown Castle (NYSE: ) reported third quarter that beat analysts' expectations on Wednesday and revenue that topped forecasts.

The firm reported earnings per share of $1.49 on revenue of $1.51B. Analysts polled by Investing.com expected EPS of $0.48 on revenue of $1.48B. That compared to EPS of $0.33 on revenue of $1.38B in the same period a year earlier. The company had reported EPS of $0.52 on revenue of $1.48B in the previous quarter.

For the year, Crown Castle shares are up 23.99%, outperforming the which is up 20.72% year to date.

Crown Castle follows other major Services sector earnings this month

On Thursday, October 3, 2019, Costco reported fourth quarter EPS of $2.69 on revenue of $47.5B, compared to forecasts of EPS of $2.54 on revenue of $47.44B.

Netflix earnings beat analyst's expectations on Wednesday, with third quarter EPS of $1.47 on revenue of $5.25B. Investing.com analysts expected EPS of $1.03 on revenue of $5.25B

Stay up-to-date on all of the upcoming earnings reports by visiting Investing.com's earnings calendar
description: Crown Castle Earnings, Revenue beat in Q3
